Reviews.Author: Henryshag
Reviews.Content: My Daughter got this tablet as a Christmas gift. By March, the power port had broken off on the inside. It was under warranty, but Coby would not replace it because I did not have the original receipt. IF YOU BUY OR RECEIVE THIS AS A GIFT, HOLD ON TO YOUR RECEIPT! Coby also wanted to charge me $15 just to look at it. BUYER BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Bridgmon
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. Just having a small problem getting some apps to download, but other than that, everything works very well. The construction has held up well so far with my 4 year old as well.

Reviews.Title: Great product for price
Reviews.Author: Melissa Tuttle
Reviews.Content: Great product for a device that is feasible enough for kids. The screen is not too small. It is a little touchy at first but you get use too it after trying it out a few times.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Productt/Terrible Company
Reviews.Author: Aggravated
Reviews.Content: We gave our son the Coby MID7036 tablet for Christmas and it seemed like a nice tablet for a 9 year old at the time.  We downloaded the Amazon Marketplace and also set him up with some games he was looking forward to playing.  Almost right away we had problems charging the unit and after 30 days the charging plug simply broke.  I called Coby since Toys R Us was unresponsive and Coby told me I had to provide proof of purchase, and other documents and send it in for replacement.  Seems good right?  Not exactly!  I had to supply a money order so that Coby could ship it back too!  So the unit cost me $70 and the repair cost me an additional $15.  Oh wait, I almost forgot, they are replacing it so how long does that take you say?  Coby tells me 6-8 weeks!  Coby says that they have a "process".  Well if their process to replace a unit takes that long then they must have an awful lot of returns to deal with.  How about making a better product!  I should have just paid the extra money and bought the Kindle instead!!!!!  Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP
Reviews.Author: Matthew S. Wilsey
Reviews.Content: Ok, All android tablets are not alike. DO NOT buy cheap ones, they are not compatible with other android devices. Like your phone, or a better android device, like the Dell Streak 7. You cannot use The Google play store to download apps, so anything that you have on your other devices, and have paid for, you cannot play them on this cheapo tablet. Stick to quality tablets, which you will pay more for, but will benefit greatly. These are cheap for a reason!!

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablet 16:9 Sucks
Reviews.Author: JAMES V PAUL SR
Reviews.Content: This tablets charger tip on the inside of unit breaks easily. Amazon did send me a replacement immediately, but the same thing happened again.In my opinion Coby should redesign the DC-5V adapter tip so that it can charge from the USB like so many other companies do . I really don't recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Coby review.
Reviews.Author: catherine a. jeffers
Reviews.Content: It been a good purschase my 9 year old enjoy reading, and playing games,music and u-tube it keeps him busy all day can'tkeep him off of it. thanks Amazon it save my XMAS .

Reviews.Title: Update
Reviews.Author: TLCRN
Reviews.Content: Not the easiest to work with.  Able to get new & decent apps after downloading Amazon appstore; however, every time the tablet is turned off, I have to reinstall Amazon app so it will work again.  Otherwise, it gives me a blank screen.  Apps on the Getjar program aren't too great & I often get a failed download.  Not too bad overall considering I got this for my 2 & 10 yr old to play around with.  In the future for myself, I'll get something else.4/11/13 Update - Unit will not turn on/charge/do anything!  Not sure if it is a problem with the jack which others have mentioned or something else.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids
Reviews.Author: Pink Lady
Reviews.Content: My kids each got one of these for Christmas (they are 6 and 4). They are super easy to use and so far, the batteries seem to last a decent length of time when they remember to shut them off between use. They also charge pretty fast which is nice when you are in a hurry.

Reviews.Title: Barely works. EDIT:  Already broken
Reviews.Author: G. Larsen
Reviews.Content: Bought for my young daughter.  Has a youtube app on the home screen.  What a joke!  The processor is so underpowered, you sit there watching a loading icon and then get treated to about 3 seconds of video before it lags behind the streaming again.  Youtube is NOT watchable.  I spent 2 hrs just trying to access an app store better than Get Jar (ugh).  I kept asking myself, why is this so difficult?!  FINALLY, I was accessing Amazon Apps.  And then that stopped working.  Spend a little more, unless you're willing to struggle with what feels like 5 yr old hardware.UPDATE:  I cant believe its already broken!  This thing was barely used due to its frustrating slowness, yet the female receptor contacts for the charger plug broke loose and fell inside the unit.  Can't charge it now.  Paperweight.  Coby wants me to pay for return shipping plus a $25 fee, and for what?  To get an identical replacement unit.  It's not worth the time, money, and effort.

Reviews.Title: POOR QUALITY
Reviews.Author: John Jay
Reviews.Content: Well,..... Not a bad tablet. Has some flaws, like the charging recepticle. The one on the tablet. plug from the adapter is very suspicious. However, when I push on it, it clicks and stays put, otherwise it will fall out and not be charging when you think it should be. Still trying to figure things out on it, but the 7 inch model is a bit small. Best to use a stylus (not included).  More later...:)ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:  Recently, the recepticle on the tablet broke loose from the tablet(???). The unit is being returned. Cannot imagine this happening, but it appears to be a weak spot in the design. Now, the unit can never be charged again. This seems to be happening alot with this unit. My advice is NOT to buy this unit. It is not dependable.

Reviews.Title: pretty nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Bebrezzy
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for a little over a month now. It works well for the most part but it has very slow internet and frezzes a lot. Other then that its pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Hubby loves it
Reviews.Author: Heather Coggins
Reviews.Content: my husband has loved it, I would like something with a  camera myself. I do wish i would have got one like that for him but he really enjoys watching his sports stuff on it

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the budget-minded
Reviews.Author: Thomas Briner
Reviews.Content: As always shipping was a breeze.These tablets may not have cameras, but I could care less as I use them for keeping in touch with others.They are surprisingly fast for a 1Ghz processor.Android's Ice Cream Sandwich OS is a blast to use as well.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Susan Doughty
Reviews.Content: I thought it had a camera on it. But my daughter liked it anyway. I would purchase another one but only if it has a camera.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Terry Moise
Reviews.Content: I would like to say that the coby is every thing I had hoped for thank you so much and the price was amazing.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: amy wilson
Reviews.Content: my kids loved it, it works just fine. we have had issues with it being a little slow with the internet and we were sad to see it doesnt have a camera

Reviews.Title: not a good product
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this product to anyone, i bought 3 of this and within the first couple of days one of then would not respond to the touchscreen then the screen just warped, the second one had no sound after a couple of days, and the third one was broke where you plug in to charge, very dissatisfied with this product!!

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: joy gabby "joy gabby"
Reviews.Content: i got this for my son bday and christmas gifts isnt working atalll no apps etc,,,,he wasnt too happy when i retunr will get him differnt tablets

Reviews.Title: Great for the money!
Reviews.Author: bootsie mcq
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet mostly for the price. I wanted to try out a tablet to check out the format before I bought a more expensive one. It was ready right out of the box, and does most things I wanted a tablet for, such as email, Facebook, and web searching. After learning the keyboard on the Kyros, I purchased a tablet stand with keyboard to use at home. It's a recommended addition.  This is really a good little tablet for the price. The only real lack is a camera, so no Skype. Based on price alone, I'd give it 5 stars. but overall, a good solid 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have bought several of these tablets for my wife and sons. They are very well built and really work as expected. I plan to keep buying more in the future for employees. The fact that they use GetJar instead of Android Market is of no concern now that we know there are several alternatives available. Fully recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Junk do not purchase!
Reviews.Author: Steve Lester
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of crap and not worth the purchase price do not buy it.The OS has been screwed up so you cannot get Google Play store. And while you can download Amazon App Store it doesn't function properly on this system.  The App Store that comes installed on the device 'GetJar' never lets me download anything, the DLs always fail.  I am going to root the device to see if it improves things but unless you are comfortable in doing so don't go near this thing.The hardware itself is cheap and flimsy so even if I get this thing to work for my son I don't expect it to last more than a few months.  The touch screen is horrible and it often takes a HARD press to get it to recognize you're even touching the screen.  It takes a special charging cable and will not charge via the micro-usb port so you cannot charge it via your PC or any other standard charger, so good luck if you lose the charger.

Reviews.Title: Grandson loves his tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Larry Kuder
Reviews.Content: My grandson just loves his tablet he got for christmas. He said that was the best present he got for christmas!! Glad he is enjoying it!!

Reviews.Title: Okay, not great
Reviews.Author: Anna Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I also own the Ipad 4 and Ipad mini, this product is okay not great, but for the price you cant really get much more. It was perfect for my little brother

Reviews.Title: Tablet will no longer charge and keeps shutting itself down.
Reviews.Author: Pat H.
Reviews.Content: My son saved up his own money and bought this tablet in Nov. 2012. It was a good little tablet for the price. It was frustrating not having Google Play and not happy with GetJar but use Amazon App Store to download most apps. The only frustrating thing is every time the tablet is completely shut down and than turned on again, I have to sign into the Amazon App store and reset all the settings. For Christmas for my other two sons, I decided to get them each this exact tablet. 4 days after Christmas one of the tablets will longer charge and it keeps automatically shutting down. Today, my other son's tablet is doing the same thing. I don't know if we just got a bad batch because my son who got his in Nov. is working fine. Wondering if anyone else who purchased this tablet is also having trouble with the tablets no longer charging? I was happy with the tablets until now.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: LILIANA LIO
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my daughter, for her its fine but if it would be for myself I wouldn't like because is way too slow, it needs more velocity.

Reviews.Title: Read below on how to get Google Play! - UPDATED
Reviews.Author: D. Kim
Reviews.Content: I bought this on one of those lightning deals that Amazon was running around Black Friday for my 8 yr old son's Christmas gift.  I figured it's so inexpensive, why not give it a try?  Like many reviewers pointed out, the unit does not come with Google Play installed.  Yes-annoying.  But fortunately, some tech-smart folks have figured out a way to address tis (which makes sense given that you'd expect at this price point, many people will actually purchase this).  The link is below.  The instructions are super easy.  I got it working in one shot.  Now my kid is really happy.[...](if the link gets lobotomized by Amazon, the website is www+androidtablets+net - change the +'s to .'s and search for "50425-root-gapps-telechips")OK - just to confirm, this tablet is on the slower side.  It takes longer to install apps and it takes longer to launch apps.  But once launched, the apps run fine.  Note that this does NOT have a camera (zero, no front, no back).  It does NOT have GPS.  The video isn't the brightest, but the resolution is good enough (800x480).  The audio is LOUD (probably not the best quality, but it is definitely loud).  It does have a microphone so things like voice dictation into Google search will work.In summary, this is definitely a good intro/starter device, well worth the $$ I spent on it!.Good luck!UPDATE: As I now see on other reviews, the power port is indeed flimsy and touchy.  At first, the cord had to be plugged in in a specific way to charge, but then ultimately, the port just fell into the case.  I sent it in for warranty repairs along with the $15 money order.  It's been about 8 weeks and still no response.  I know this was purchased on the cheap, but it should last more than a month!

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Jutta Carroll
Reviews.Content: Was unsure about the tablet when I got it, after reviewing the Coby I was sold on it, the price is right and the Android app is great, easy to use and it covered all the things I wanted it to do, ereader,email, internet all are great and easy to use. Wish it had a larger GB for the price, if so it would sell out of the stores, I don't need the Ipad if I had this. Good product

Reviews.Title: GREAT TABLET
Reviews.Author: Gail Johnson
Reviews.Content: It was given to my big Sis for Christmas, she loves it. Thank u for a Great product. Great starter.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: All the kids love the tablets they got for Christmas gifts. They watch netflix and load and play games and do school work. Only problem is with the pin that you plug your charger in at it has a tendency to break and if you send it in to Coby it takes a minimum of 6 weeks to get it back and they charge you 15 dollars money order to be shipped in the returned box plus you have to do it registered mail which cost another 25 dollars. So by the time you pay all the costs it runs you almost the amount it cost to buy it.

Reviews.Title: for the price decent
Reviews.Author: Ryan Knowles
Reviews.Content: you will not find a better deal on a tablet that is not as big as others and bigger than your phone. good apps but if you plan to use for more that pleasure like for work or your taxes; good luck.

Reviews.Title: So-so
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: It was a good product but when you look at something white its real grainy like you have grease on the screen, you get what you pay for but its very fast, the plastic is very cheap though carefull when pushing down on screen it could blimish

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: Mattie D
Reviews.Content: Gave 1 to a 5 n 6 yr old and they have been great for them when we go out to dinner or other places they think are boring. Free game downloads and wifi access but not quite what I personally would want in a tablet for myself.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: joan King
Reviews.Content: I found this really well priced Tablet on Amazon as a gift for our daughter.  She wanted a pink one so I also ordered the pink case and accessories.  She couldn't wait to start using it.

Reviews.Title: They loved it!!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Eric Alva "Christopher"
Reviews.Content: Got 2 of these for my girls kids for christmas. They loved it especially the youngest one. It great for Netflix, games and just browsing the web!

Reviews.Title: Interesting.....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Spartan Queen"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a beginners tablet for my daughter who is 5 yrs old. It does the trick! She has dropped it several times and yet it works well.  It accesses the internet as well as any other tablet.  Only down side is it gets a little hot, but she doesn't seem to mind this.Excellent product for a child who is in between stages: that is, between the toddler stages and say the Fire or iPad stage. Oh, and its easy to access games for it as well as put movies on it.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Stephanie C. bryant
Reviews.Content: so far so good well find out more when she gets it for christmas but so far it seems to be fine  plugged it up and tryed it out looks good

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Danni
Reviews.Content: The Kyros 7-inch is great for kids. Being a small and compact size makes it easy for them to carry and fun to both learn and play. This a good little tablet that provides everything a kid needs. Games and learning apps. All in all, I believe it is worth the price for younger ones.

Reviews.Title: Just i'd expected
Reviews.Author: Maria C. Colmenares M
Reviews.Content: I  got it a couple days ago, on time offered by seller. Unpacked and turn on in two minutes. Pack looks pretty well. It comes pre-charged (i don't know if full charge but gave me four hours full of activities installing apps, surfing the web, and others). Connecting to my home and work wifi was simply and quick, just found a signal, input the password and voilà. Navigation is pretty fast; installing apks too. I feel satisfied whith my purchase. Great first table capable to distract children for a while or read a good book or check emails, even  some office stuffs. I've compared with a Kindle fire HD and only wins for battery life. This KYROS no offers more than 4 continuous hours of general use but is enough for me and the money spend on it. Remarkable issues: NO GOOGLE PLAY (yes it's true, can't run in this tablet) and NO HBO GO. At the end, this product gives just what seller says and no more, but i like it. It no get 5 stars only for the battery life.

Reviews.Title: NOT what I expected, and my expectations were low to begin with
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Out of the box already charged (hmmmm.....returned product?) and started it up.Physical: Touch screen was decent, sometimes it wouldn't register but mostly it was fine just a little sluggish. The faceplate (flat bezel around the screen) is flimsy and moves when you press it making noise and feeling like it will break.Software: First of all, if you install a memory card the file manager in this unit is an absolute nightmare. It took me forever to find a way to access my memory card and then when I was finished I couldn't remember how to get back to it. It could've been solved with a few lines of code and an option to view memory card files! This is one of the main reasons I am returning the item. It literally gives you a headache every time you try and find a file on your memory card.This system did not come with as many apps as I thought it would. Just the bare minimum and what IS on there is 2nd rate stuff. No Google Play so I had to try and go online via wifi to download it so I could add apps. HERE is the main reason I am returning this item. I have an HD Dual Band $130 wireless router, huge speeds, and it took literally 10 minutes at a time to access a page on the internet. I was connected with "extremely high" signal onto this device so it was either a poor browser they had on it or the actual network hardware is bad. It was horrid. There were also problems with websites, not showing parts OR a really weird thing where if I visited a page and it timed out I was never able to access it again, even after device reboot.So...without being able to download apps, without being able to install apps easily from my memory card, this item is pretty much worthless. I know it is relatively cheap - but a Honda is relatively cheap too, and I'd much rather be driving one of those.

Reviews.Title: Noooo
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: It Was Different From Picture, And The Audio Broke As Soon As I Got It, Won't Let You Use Google Play, And "GetJar" Had Very Few Interesting Apps! Most Were Bootlegged, And Fakes E Music Requires A Credit Card Just To Sign Up... Horrible Tablet!!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work very well
Reviews.Author: Butterfly Lover
Reviews.Content: I am sorry I bought this,as I can't get on any websites,log into anything. for what I paid I should be able to do more on it....] there arn't any APPS,it's just NOT a good tablet to buy. Sorry I did ! ! ! i would definitely NOT reccomend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: the worst tablet i have ever seen
Reviews.Author: aida khodadad
Reviews.Content: it looks very cheap , worst quality i have ever seen. loses the battery very fast. just good for kids. it is completely different with what you see in picture

Reviews.Title: No google play store aplication for me is a big NOOOOO
Reviews.Author: Crisoforo Lopez Cruz
Reviews.Content: This is an android icecream tablet that doesnt allow you install google play store, my favorite applications are there so for that simple reason I consider this a very bad product, there are other products around better than this.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Violeta
Reviews.Content: Very good for the price, but the battey is not so good, I bought a case that came up as recomend and it does not fit to Coby Kyros, so watch out

Reviews.Title: Good tablet with a good deal!
Reviews.Author: kinghersheykiss
Reviews.Content: Pros: works great. Comes with usb cleaner case & chargerCons: No Google Play but you can get good e reader app from getjar and from that you can get the amazon appstore which is a great alternative  to google play

Reviews.Title: so far not bad
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Smith
Reviews.Content: not bad build quality, quite a bit of fiddling to get it to do things.....amazon app store is still problematic, have to delete and  re-install to get it to open hoping an update will help

Reviews.Title: Somewhere in the middle
Reviews.Author: Madscientist "lcjr2002"
Reviews.Content: This is not a very good tablet. It is not a very bad one either. The tablet is completely plastic and it has a toy-like feel to it. The display is not even in the same quality category as the original Kindle Fire. The tablet is light weight as it is made of plastic. It probably will not survive the lightest of drops without damage to the plastic case, the display or both. The tablet has no camera, no GPS, no compass (it does auto-rotate, though). It does not come with the GooglePlay store either. Overall, this tablet is not in the same category quality-wise as the original Kindle Fire, Nook Color, or Nook Tablet. Not to mention the latest releases of the aforementioned devices.On the good side, this tablet has WiFi and connected to my home network in seconds. I was surprised that the tablet does load websites pretty quickly. In fact, web sites on this tablet are loaded much faster than on the original Kindle Fire and Nook tablet. Android applications can be sideloaded to the tablet. For example, you can download an APK and install it right there. I found the tablet to be responsive. This tablet was faster in every test I performed compared to the Kindle Fire first generation that I own. I had no problems sideloading several applications and they all worked well with good response. I don't know if GooglePlay can be installed on this tablet. I have not tried but I imagine that with enough effort it can be done. The Amazon app store can be installed fairly easy.Would I recommend this tablet? I don't know. Probably not. Depends at what price you are going to purchase it. I got it for $70 shipped and I feel that's probably the absolute maximum it is worth spending on it. In my case, I bought it for testing and development and the tablet fits that purpose well. For most people, though, I am inclined to recommend to just spend an extra $30 or $40 on some other tablet and not this one. I have used Chinese tablets that sell between $90 - $100 that are of much better build quality than this tablet, come with the GooglePlay market, and have much better displays. It is worth spending a little bit more money and getting something that is noticeably better in all aspects.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY COBY UNLESS YOU LIKE GETTING RIPPED OFF
Reviews.Author: oldeschool
Reviews.Content: CHECK OUT THIS COMPANY'S RATING BEFORE YOU BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM AND YOU WILL SEE WHAT IM TALKING ABOUT OR TRY TO CALL THEIR CONTACT NUMBERS THEY DONT EXIST. I SENT BACK A TABLET AND 15.OO RETURN FEE SO JUST GAVE THAT MONEY AWAY. THE COST OF THE TABLET AND RETURN FEE OR THE TABLET WERE NEVER SENT BACK TO ME.....

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for... (Zero Star rating)
Reviews.Author: C T
Reviews.Content: Please don't waste your money. When you walk into a store and see the same items that do the same thing but one costs $70 and the other $470, believe me, there is a reason. I know this only too well and still went cheap for my daughter's Christmas Present. I will kick myself forever for doing this. It works when it wants to and wen it does you get constant error messages. The processing time is a joke. I think the comodore I had when I was a kid that loaded games with a tape player is faster than this. It can't even work it's own Droid apps.  Now I'm stuck with it because I don't even have the guts of selling or giving this to anyone. I am not that cruel.  My daughter now shares my wife's tablet and her brand new "toy" sits there collecting dust. Little detail: She's 7 years old and can't stand to look at it. It is so frustrating to use that it should be sold as a patience tester or some sort of pscicological experiment on the user. Experiments like, How long does it take for someone to go from complete peace of mind to absolute desctruction mode. Wouldn't take long with this little beauty I guarantee you. Be extra careful if you have a heart condition.  Anyway, I think you get my point.... Good luck on your seach for a tablet!

Reviews.Title: The screen became unresponsive after 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Latanya stewart
Reviews.Content: This tablet had not been dropped or anything and the screen is messed up. I would like a refund please.

Reviews.Title: Help me to returno this product.
Reviews.Author: Cecilia pereira
Reviews.Content: Please can somebody help me I need return this Coby Kyros, but I dont know how. This product dont have camera, I need with camera please????Cecilia M. Pererira

Reviews.Title: Coby Christmas
Reviews.Author: Deun06
Reviews.Content: I got it as a Christmas gift for my mother who has no clue about new technology & she loves it. Learning new things everyday!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I could generously give the product 2 stars based on the fact that it meets the standard set by its price. However, ONE star fits the product much better. The ability to buy my 3 year old a tablet in which he could play angry birds, and that it cost as much as a Leapster Explorer sounded great. When I received the product I was feeling pretty good right until I turned it on...1. The body of the tablet, made of plastic, had a few rough edges, not from damage but from a poor mold from the factory.2. The screen was fine and pretty accurate, but the processing capability ends at running the clock widget.3. The software store has a very limited selection and lacks many apps. I wished to download some for my 3 year old (readily available from Google Play Store for my Iconia a500 tablet), but was unable to find them.4. When I managed to download Angry Birds, the tablet crashed and required a reset. It took 3 download attempts to finally have it install. Once I could start the app, it was very choppy.Even my 3 year old has enough technology capabilities that I quickly knew he wouldn't use it as he would get just as frustrated as I was. Within 10 minutes of opening the box I decided to return BOTH of the tablets and had no intention of testing the unopened one.I do NOT recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Do you enjoy 'tweeking' - because this one needs it
Reviews.Author: fpearman
Reviews.Content: A tablet – like a computer – can be used for a dedicated or multiple application(s).  Some may be satisfied that this tablet ‘does what they need it to do’ – or what they can download from ‘GetJar’.  For me – I wanted to install a variety of Android applications – beyond what ‘GetJar’ offers.  The device seems to be almost proprietary allowing easy downloads thru GetJar -  which are very limited in their app offerings.  But I wanted to download apps from various other sites, Amazon, Google, etc.Because of that – I have spent 2 days un-installing, re-installing, resetting  - trying to get this thing to work for my needs.FWIW - I am computer literate and have a Google Nexus 7 which I am very satisfied with.  I purchased this Coby – with the intent of being a gift for a family member.  But – I am convinced this thing is not worthy as giving as a gift – or retain for yourself unless you enjoy ‘tweeking’ a poor product.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: rafael toro II
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet for kids.  My kids enjoyed opening this tablet on their birthdays.  I was impressed with it so I purchased two more.  Recommended.

Reviews.Title: WORSE PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: Julie Larson
Reviews.Content: I wqaqnt my money back, this piece of s*** doesn't allow the kids to buy games and buy anything for good use.  It only does a simple things.  The kids hate it and I wasted my money on it.  WORST purchaser for Christmas ever.HATE HATE HATE, want my money back.Thanks,Julie Larson

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Ibelis Manzano
Reviews.Content: The tablet is in excellent condition. Very good negotiation. I download the application and it works great. I'm happy with the purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: Terrible product!
Reviews.Author: dana
Reviews.Content: I spent a long time researching this product to see if it was worth my time to even try it out.  I wanted an iPad but I would have had to save up for about a year to afford one.  I took my chance with the Coby tablet because I read a lot of great reviews.  I had the tablet for about 6 months.  I didn't use it for the first 4 months because I couldn't set up my email on it, it didn't have my favorite apps, and I couldn't log into my school account information.  I really only got it for those reasons.  However, I finally realized I should just let the kids I babysit play with it instead of have it go to waste.  I found some great games that I loved and started realizing the benefits of the tablet.  I loved the tablet so much I bought one for my mom for Christmas and she was so excited!  Then, a week later, two of the games that I loved just stopped working one day.  About a month ago, not a single app would open up.  Then the tablet kept turning off.  A couple of days later it just wouldn't turn on anymore.  My mom's Coby crashed days after mine and hers was only about a month old.  I feel so bad for buying it for my mom.  She is really disappointed.  I should have taken the money I wasted on my Coby and put it towards an iPad.  I'm done with cheap tablets!  Maybe I can afford an iPad by the end of the year :(  I would give this product 0 stars if possible!

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: Jimbo
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for a kid learning to use technology.  Remember - you are paying well under a hundred bucks for it!Good grief people - it's obvious that you can't access Google Play.  GetJar has quite a few app's and if you are smart enough you can get the Amazon App Store installed and get darn near everything you need via Amazon.  It's real difficult to get the Amazon App Store.  You go to GetJar, search for "Amazon" and you will be rewarded with several app's sponsored by Amazon. Don't forget to click the "download" button too. You also need a microSDHC card.  They are about $25.  Move all the app's you can from the tablet to the memory card and you won't run out of space.  Again, for under a hundred bucks, 3 hours of battery life isn't bad.  I'm not sure if people are expecting iPad quality but this is really a decent starter tablet for kids, or if you aren't sure if you need or want a tablet - this is a great one to start with.  This is a great deal for the $.The only issue I have with it is that it occasionally loses connection to my wireless network.  It comes back in a few seconds but it is irritating when it happens.  That brought it down to 4 stars instead of 5.

Reviews.Title: (the best most portable tablet i have ever bought), nahhh no more
Reviews.Author: Dion
Reviews.Content: Edit: Noticed it didn't have google play, and some very important apps. Sorry i gave it 5 stars, now giving it 2 stars.I bought this product as a combo with the leather case cover and multi touch pen and other needed stuffs. I was scared of buying it at first cos it might come with a defect, but then I think it is a very good investment I made. The price is great. But beware that, if you buy it with the leather case keyboard, the keyboard does not connect directly to the tablet cos the tablet lacks a USB port. You will have to buy a separate $1 port (which was included in the combo)to properly connect both. I wish the tablet had a USB port and I also wish that in subsequent tablets they make, they would interchange the position of the power switch wit the audio port.But order than this flaw, everyother thing is great.

Reviews.Title: It's worth the price
Reviews.Author: Nici
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  For an inexpensive tablet, it does the job.  You can get all the apps through "GetJar", which comes installed.  Getting the Amazon appstore requires some tricks that I wasn't willing to try.  Netflix works, but is slow to load.  The navigation is a little tricky compared to the Kindle Fire.  But my five year old is able to use it just fine.

Reviews.Title: product is not bad however....
Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet reading other customer reviews. I didn't expect much but I didn't want to spend much for something I was not sure I would like. I really liked it but after 30 days, it would not turn on. Amazon was wonderful, they sent me another one in two days delivered to my door. This screen seemed to operate smoother and faster, however again it stopped working after 30 days. I am sending it back to Amazon and have decided to try another more expensive one. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: great product for a great price
Reviews.Author: Christine G. "the_gibos"
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything I need.  It is not a high end tablet, but there are plenty of apps, wifi is speedy, keeps my kids entertained when we are out, can go away and still easily check email, read news, browse etc.

Reviews.Title: 7" Coby tablet
Reviews.Author: Sean Ruru
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this tablet. It has free games & apps which can be downloaded from getjar. We bought this for our 11 yr old who loves it. For the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Nice performance
Reviews.Author: Ale R "Ale"
Reviews.Content: I'm really satisfied with my new tablet, it's really easy to carry because of its size. I've been able to download lots ofapps from GetJar, the only con is that this brand isn't recognized by Google Play, so you can't download any app from there, but as I said, I downloaded lots of apps from the other site. Other issue it's about Skype, I don't know if it's because the tablet doesn't have a camera' but when I call someone I'm not able to see the other person.It reads PDF files, and other formats so I have been reading lots of books, in Alkido, that's already in the tablet, you're able to download lots of free books, of public domain, like classics.I highly recommend this product, it's ideal also for children, my little brother has been playing a lot with it. Video and sound quality is good. You could connect a keyboard of you want, you just need an adaptor that's like 4 dollars on amazon.
